panorama.translation[0].definitions[0].d: an impressive view of a wide area of land
panorama.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The tower offers a panorama of the city.
panorama.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a description or series of pictures that shows all the features of a subject, historical period etc
panorama.translation[0].definitions[1].e: a panorama of life in England 400 years ago
panorama.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a British television programme about politics and current affairs which is broadcast on the BBC and is known for its investigative journalism (=when a reporter tries to find out the true facts about something that is happening in politics, business etc)
